    Marketing

    I’m currently working as the Digital Marketing lead for Human Element in Ann Arbor, Michigan. Email me at ddickerson@human-element.com for lead-gen and ecommerce marketing, speaking engagements, and rants about trademark law. I’ve worked in-house, agency, venture capital, startups, and franchise marketing over the last 10 years; here’s my intermittently updated LinkedIn.
